briefTitle: A Study to Investigate the Efficacy and Safety of Eribulin in Korean Breast Cancer Participants
officialTitle: A Nationwide, Multi-institutional Retrospective Study of Efficacy and Safety of Eribulin in Korean Breast Cancer Patients
conditions: Locally Advanced or Metastatic Breast Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Confirmed diagnosis of locally advanced or metastatic breast cancer
* Participants who were treated with Eribulin between 01 June, 2014 and 31 December, 2016

Exclusion Criteria:

* Not applicable
